name: It Starts With The Confession To The Beauty Master
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManga
content: If he fails to confess his love to his beautiful master, he’ll turn into a dog? Zhang Yi obtained the Destiny System and awakened the Supreme Holy Body. As long as he’s able win the heart of the beauties in his harem, he’ll be able to get stronger! A cold master, a charming female Taoist senior, a cute junior sister, a sickly princess, and a pure saint… In the face of thousands of beauties, Zhang Yi has no interest in love: Let me go! This is not the destiny system, it’s clearly a system that wi
